com.facebook.buck.cli

Class BuckQueryEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.BuckQueryEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.devtools.build.lib.query2.engine.QueryEnvironment<BuildTarget>

    public class BuckQueryEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.devtools.build.lib.query2.engine.QueryEnvironment<BuildTarget>
    The environment of a Buck query that can evaluate queries to produce a result. The query language is documented at docs/command/query.soy
